sources.full: Hololive 5e: Fifteen VTubers as NPCs for DnD 5e

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Kanata's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: Kanata's weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with any weapon, she deals an extra {@damage 2d8} radiant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Sadistic Angel
entries: Kanata's weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 2d8} slashing damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Chairman's Companion
entries: When Kanata is within 30ft. of Kiryu Coco, she has advantage on all attack rolls and skill checks.

trait.name: Kanagorilla
entries: Kanata has advantage on all Strength and Strength based ability checks and Strength saving throws.

trait.name: Filled with Determination
entries: If an attack would reduce Kanata to O hit points, she must make a {@dc 12} saving throw. On a success, she is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kanata makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Kanabou
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage and plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Halo
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage and plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: Kanata touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 ({@dice 4d8 + 2}) hit points and is freed from an curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.
If she really wants...she can die, and then I'll take her to the heavens!

entries.name: Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link キア|https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/83403505}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: On her first turn, Suisei has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Suisei makes against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Suisei is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Suisei deals an extra 13 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and she doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Suiciopath (3/ per day)
entries: As an action, Suisei may cast disguise self, with a spell save DC of 15. She is limited in disguising herself as creatures she has killed in the past 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Suisei makes two handaxe attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage, plus 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking the poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Throwing Axe
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage, plus 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking the poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link @Chameleon_Ch|https://twitter.com/x/migrate?tok=7b2265223a222f692f7765622f7374617475732f31333539333434333930333031333830363132222c2274223a313731393630373134307def1bccd564a2641b33d389afda2c33f8}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

trait.name: Vehicles (Water) +10
entries: Marine has a +10 proficiency with Vehicles (Water).

trait.name: 17 Second Season
entries: Marine has disadvantage on initiative rolls. After the first round of combat, she rolls Constitution saves at disadvantage.

trait.name: Hosho Pirate Captain
entries: All friendly creatures within 30ft. of Marine have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saves.

trait.name: Pirate of the Seas and Skies
entries: While standing on a water or airborne vehicle, Marine has advantage on Dexterity and Dexterity based skill checks. Marine also ignores any difficult terrain on board a water or airborne vehicle.

trait.name: Swashbuckler
entries: While wearing light armor, Marine adds her Charisma modifier to her AC and to weapon damage rolls (already included). When Marine makes a melee attack aggainst a creature, that creature cannot make opportunity attacks against Marine for the rest of her turn.

trait.name: Duelist (1/ turn)
entries: If Marine is within 5ft. of a creature, and no hostile creatures are within 5ft. of Marine, she may deal an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage on a hit with a melee weapon.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Marine makes three weapon attacks, only one of which may be a pistol attack.

action.name: Cutlass
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Ahoy! (1/day)
entries: Until the start of Marine's next turn, all friendly creatures within 30ft. of Marine that can see or hear her gain a 4 ({@dice 1d8}) bonus to any attack rolls or saving throws they make. This effect ends if Marine is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Captain's Challenge
entries: Marine targets a creature which can hear her and with whom she shares a language. The target must make a DC 16 Wisdom save. On a failure, for one minute the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls against targets other than Marine, and can't make opportunity attacks on creatures other than Marine. The target may attempt the save again at the end of all subsequent turns. This effect lasts for one minute, until the save is made, or the target is more than 60ft. from Marine.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Marine adds 5 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, she must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When a creature misses Marine with a melee attack, she may make a cutlass attack against the creature.

entries.name: Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link シワスタカシ|https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/83593053}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

trait.name: Guard Dog
entries: Korone has advantage on all initiative rolls, and advantage on all Perception checks

trait.name: Rip and Tear
entries: Whenever Korone deals damage with a melee weapon attack, she may use a bonus action to make an unarmed attack against the same creature ({@hit 6} to hit, 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage on a hit).

trait.name: Yubi Yubi!
entries: Whenever Korone reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee weapon attack, she regains 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) hit point

trait.name: Loud Doggo Noises
entries: Korone has disadvantage on all saving throws against becoming Frightened. If she fails a saving throw, instead of becoming Frightened, all creatures within 10 ft. of Korone must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 12 ({@damage 3d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half that on a succesful one. Korone then has disadvantage on all attacks which are not targeting the creature which caused the saving throw until the end of her next turn.

trait.name: Daemonblade
entries: Korone's melee weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with a melee weapon, she doubles her ability score modifier for determining damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Korone makes two greatsword or attacks or one blunderbuss attack.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Double Barelled Blunderbuss
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

entries.name: Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link NO.GOOD|https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/85902649}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

monster.name: Kiryu Coco, The Asac oco Dragon
legendaryHeader: Coco can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. She regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/ day)
entries: If Coco fails a saving throw, she may choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Angelic Companion
entries: Whenever Coco would regain  hit points due to an action by Amane Kanata, treat  any dice rolled to determine hit points regained as having rolled their maximum value.

trait.name: Change Shape
entries: As an action, Coco magically  transforms into a Medium Humanoid, or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed into or borned by her new form (Coco's  choice). In either form, Coco retains her alignment, hit points, hit die, ability to speak, proficiencies,  legendary resistances, lair actions, and all ability scores, as well as this action. Coco also retains both the Tail and Plug-In Tail action options.

trait.name: Asacoco Aura
entries: An aura of asacoco lingers around Coco at all times overpowering those who breathe it in every creature of her choice within 20 ft of her must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half that on a succesful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Coco makes up to three attacks. One with her bite and two with her claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Plug-In Tail
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 50/100 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: Coco uses the following breath weapon.

{@b Inhalation Type Asacoco.} Coco exhales a stream of concentrated asacoco in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) poison damage on a failed save and are {@condition stunned} till the end of their turn, or half as much damage on a succesful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Coco makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: Coco makes a tail or plug-in tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Coco beats her wings with a shout of profanity. Each creature within 10 ft of her must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Coco can then fly up to half her flying speed.

entries.name: Kiryu Coco, The Asac oco Dragon
Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link みかん師匠|https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/81051520}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

trait.name: Angelic Companion
entries: Whenever Coco would regain hit points due to an action by Amane Kanata, treat any dice rolled to determine hit points regained as having rolled their maximum value.

trait.name: Dragon Chairman of Crime
entries: Coco has advantage on all Persuasion, Deception, and Intimidation checks.

trait.name: Good Morning Motherfuckers
entries: Coco has advantage on Initiative rolls.

trait.name: Searing Blade
entries: Coco's katana attacks are magical, and deal an additional {@damage 2d6} fire damage on a hit (included in the attack).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Coco's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal compnents:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Coco makes two katana attacks and one tail whip attack.

action.name: Katana
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Tail whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. Target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw, or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Yakusa Dragon
entries: All creatures within 45ft. of Coco and aware of her must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw, or be Frightened for 1 minute. A creatue can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending this effect on a success. If a creature succeeds on their save, or the effect ends, they are immune to this action for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Coco adds 5 to her AC against one melee  attack that would hit her. To do so, she must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

entries.name: Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link MAZEL|https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/80687559}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

monster.name: Calliope Mori, the Handmaid of Death

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Calliope has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: Calliope is immune to the effects of Turn Undead.

trait.name: Welcome to the Mountaintop
entries: Calliope has advantage on Performance and Intimidation checks.

trait.name: Could You Please RIP ?
entries: Calliope's weapon attacks are magical. When Calliope deals damage with a weapon attack, she deals an additional {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Death Sensei
entries: If Calliope is reduce to 0 hit points, she reappears on the appropriate plane (e.g. Negative Energy Plane, Dolurrh, etc.) in {@dice 1d6} days having regained full hit points.

trait.name: Dead Beats
entries: Bodies or skeletons within 60 ft. of Calliope can not be raised as undead.

trait.name: Kusotori
entries: If Calliope is within 30 ft. of Takanashi Kiara at the start of Calliope's turn, she must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw, or be Turned for 1 minute.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement (1/ day)
entries: As a bonus action, Calliope may gain the following effects. She gains a walking and flying speed of 60 ft. and may pass through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. This effect lasts for one hour.

bonus.name: Incorporeal Movement (1/ day)
entries: As a bonus action, Calliope may gain the following effects. She gains a walking and flying speed of 60 ft. and may pass through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. This effect lasts for one hour.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Calliope makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Ricky
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) slashing damage, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Reaping
entries: Calliope targets a creature with 0 hit points within 5 ft. of her. The target must make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw, taking a single failed Death Saving Throw on a success. On a failure, the target immediately dies, and the creature may not be resurrected by any spell other than {@spell Wish}.

entries.name: Calliope Mori, the Handmaid of Death

entries: Make no mistake, these are killer vibes.
I don't "take breaks" 'cause I'm taking lives!
To die by the scythe? It's the highest honor!
Run and hide?! You can try...
You're a goddamn goner!

entries.name: Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link Setu.la|https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/84863380}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Ayame has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Lucky Oni
entries: If Ayame rolls a natural 1 for an ability check, saving throw, or attack roll, she may re-roll the dice and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Oni Swordsman
entries: Ayame may take the Disengage action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Asura & Rakshasa
entries: Asura and Rakshasa are +1 magical weapons (included in the attack). So long as she is wielding both Asura and Rakshasa she gains a +1 to her AC.

trait.name: Poyoyo
entries: As a bonus action, Ayame may have her familiar distract an opponent. Ayame targets one creature within 30 ft. of her. She has advantage on attack rolls against the target until the start of her next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ayame makes an attack with either Ashura or Rasetsu. As a bonus action, she may make an attack with the other.

action.name: Ashura
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage. Target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution save, or take an Bleeding Wound. While the target has the Bleeding Wound, it loses an additional 5 hit points at the start of its turn. This effect is stackable. A Bleeding Wound may be removed if the target takes an action and succeeds on a {@dc 12} Medicine check, or if the target regains any hit points magically.

action.name: Rakshasa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage. Non-magical armor takes a permanent and cumulative -1 to AC. If it is reduced to 10 AC, the armor is destroyed.

bonus.name: Popoyo
entries: As a bonus action, Ayame may have her familiar distract an opponent. Ayame targets one creature within 30 ft. of her. She has advantage on attack rolls against the target until the start of her next turn.

bonus.name: Oni Swordsman
entries: Ayame may take the Disengage action as a bonus action.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Ayame adds 5 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, she must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Oni's Counter
entries: Ayame adds 2 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. She may then immediately move up to 20 ft. in a straight line away from the attacker. This movement does not trigger attacks of opportunity. To do so, she must see the attacker.

entries.name: Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link @fenlil0316|https://x.com/fenlil0316/status/1369950322794192900}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

monster.name: Ninomae Ina'nis, the Herald of  the Ancient Ones

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Ina has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Gift of the Ancient Ones
entries: Ina has advantage on all {@status concentration} checks to maintain {@status concentration} spells.

trait.name: Book of the Ancient Ones
entries: Once per day, Ina may use an action to regain all expended spell slots.

trait.name: Protection of the Ancient Ones
entries: Ina has resistance against Pyschic damage. Ina's thoughts can not be read by telepathy unless she allows it. Whenever a creature deals psychic damage to Ina, that creature takes the same amount of damage she does. Ina may cast Stoneskin and Mage Armor at will.

trait.name: Eldritch Artist
entries: If any creature attempts and Intelligence (Investigation) check to perceive a School of Illusion spell cast by Ina, that check is made at disadvantage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ina is an 18th level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, +10 to hit with spell attacks). Ina has the following spells available:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ina may cast a spell or use Eldritch Blast, and make two Tentacle Bonk attacks.

action.name: Eldritch Blast
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 300/300 ft., four targets. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) force damage. Once per turn, Ina may move a creature hit by Eldritch Blast 10 ft. closer or further away from her in a straight line.

action.name: Tentacle Bonk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d12}) bludgeoning damage. Ina may choose to grapple the target (escape {@dc 18}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and has disadvantage on Strength saving throws. Ina may restrain up to four creatures at a time.

reaction.name: Tentacle Block
entries: Ina adds 5 to her AC against one melee or ranged attack that would hit her. To do so, she must see the attacker.

entries.name: Ninomae Ina'nis, the Herald of  the Ancient Ones
Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link Forgotten_Wings|https://old.reddit.com/r/Hololive/comments/ltwh51/dominatrix/}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

monster.name: Sakura Miko, the Messenger of the Gods

trait.name: Elite Miko
entries: All of Miko's weaponss are +1 magic weapons (included in the attack).

trait.name: FAQ U
entries: As an action, Miko may target 3 creatures within 60 ft. of her. The targeted creatures gain a Curse Point. Miko may use a free action or reaction to expend the Curse Point to impose disadvantage on any skill check, saving throw, or attack made by the targeted creature. A creature may have only one Curse Point at a time.

trait.name: Elite Kagura
entries: As an action, Miko may target 3 creatures within 60 ft. of her. The targeted creatures gain a Luck Point. The targeted creature may choose to expend a Luck Point to gain advantage on any skill check, saving throw, or attack. A creature may have only one Luck Point at a time.

trait.name: Pekomiko's Great War
entries: If Miko grants Usada Pekora either a Luck Point or Curse Point, then instead of granting advantage or disadvantage, expending a Luck Point may transform any one skill check, saving throw, or attack into a natural 20, and expending a Curse Point may transform any one skill check, saving throw, or attack into a natural 1.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Miko's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). She can cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Miko makes three weapon attacks.

action.name: Tessen
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Ofuda
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) radiant damage.

entries.name: Sakura Miko, the Messenger of the Gods
Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link 海鼠|https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/81546129}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

trait.name: Half-Elf
entries: Flare has advantage on all saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and cannot be put to sleep by magical means.

trait.name: Flaming Archer
entries: Flare's ranged attacks are not affected by being made at long range, and ignore both half and three-quarters cover. Her ranged attacks count as magical, and deal an additional 6 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on hits (included in the attack). When she makes a ranged attack and misses, she may use a bonus action to re-roll the attack against a different target within 60 ft. of the original target.

trait.name: Harem Builder
entries: Flare has advantage on all Charisma and Charisma based ability checks.

trait.name: Always Prepared
entries: Flare has advantage on all Survival and Nature checks. Once per day, as an action, Flare may regain 14 ({@dice 4d4 + 4}) hit points or remove any one of the following conditions from herself or a willing creature she can touch: Blinded, Deafened, Paralyzed, Poisoned.

trait.name: Order of Shirogane
entries: Whenever Flare would add additional dice to her damage rolls due to an action by Shirogane Noel, she treats those dice as having rolled their maximum possible value.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Flare makes two attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Archer's Eye (1/day)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Arcane Shot {@recharge 5}
entries: Flare uses one of the following arcane shot attacks.

action.name: Bursting Arrow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. All creatures within 10 ft. of the target take 6 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage.

action.name: Piercing Arrow
entries: All creatures in a line 1 ft. wide and 30 ft. long must make a DC 15 Dexterity save, taking 11 ({@damage 1d8 + 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage and 6 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a succes.

action.name: Seeking Arrow
entries: Flare chooses one target she has seen in the past day. So long as this target is within 600 ft. it must make a DC 15 Dexterity save, taking 8 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage and 6 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

action.name: Grasping Arrow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. The creature hit by the arrow takes an additional 6 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, and takes an additonal 6 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage the first time it moves more than 1 ft. without teleporting at the start of each subsequent turn. The targeted creature may make a DC 15 Strength save at the end of its turn to end this effect, otherwise it lasts for 1 minute.

entries.name: Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link 朱狗|https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/84108864}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

monster.name: Shirogane Noel, The Silver Lady Knight

trait.name: Hey Muscle!
entries: Noel has advantage on all Strength and Strength based ability checks and Strength saving throws.

trait.name: Dragonbane
entries: Noel has a +3 bonus to any rolls made to grapple Dragons.

trait.name: Be my Fan!
entries: Noel has advantage on rolls to Intimidate.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Noel has advantage on saving throws against being Frightened.

trait.name: Elfriend (1/ Day)
entries: If a melee attack by any creature would reduce Shiranui Flare to below half of her hit point total or to 0 hit points and Flare is within 60ft. of Noel, then Noel may, as a reaction, immediately move to within 5ft. of the creature whose action triggered this ability. She then makes a mace attack against that creature. Flare then immediately regains 10 ({@dice 1d10 + 5}) hit points, plus an additional 3 ({@dice 1d6}) hit points for each attack of opportunity which was or could have been made against Noel in her movement.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Noel makes three mace attacks, or uses one mace attack and any one other action.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Grappling Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. Noel may grapple the target as a bonus action.

action.name: Distracting Attack
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. Noel adds 4 ({@dice 1d8}) to her damage roll. The next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than you has advantage if the attack is made before the start of your next turn.

action.name: Commander's Strike
entries: Noel directs a friendly creature who can see or hear her to attack. That creature may then make one weapon atttack as a reaction, adding 4 ({@dice 1d8}) to the damage roll.

action.name: Evasive Footwork
entries: Noel adds 4 ({@dice 1d8}) to her AC until the start of her next turn.

action.name: Rally (1/day)
entries: For 1 minute, Noel can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that she can see within 30 ft. of her makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a 4 ({@dice 1d8}) to its roll provided it can hear and understand her. A creature can benefit from only one Rally die at a time. This effect ends if Noel is {@condition incapacitated}.

bonus.name: Grappling Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. Noel may grapple the target as a bonus action.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Noel adds 5 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, she must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When a creature misses Noel with a melee attack, she may use her reaction to make a mace attack against the creature, adding 4 ({@dice 1d8} to the damage roll.

reaction.name: Brace
entries: When a creature Noel sees moves within 5ft. of her, she may user her reaction to make a mace attack against the creature, adding 4 ({@dice 1d8}) to the damage roll.

entries.name: Shirogane Noel, The Silver Lady Knight
Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link @Yukidaruma718|https://x.com/_Yukidaruma718_/status/1256863892501716992}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

monster.name: Takanashi Kiara, the Majestic Phoenix

trait.name: Cook's Utensils +13
entries: Kiara has a +13 proficiency with Cook's Utensils.

trait.name: KFP Spicy
entries: When Kiara is reduce to half her total hit points, she immediately regains all Legendary Actions. All of Kiara's weapon attacks now also strip resistance or immunity to Fire damage on a hit.

trait.name: Majestic Phoenix
entries: When Kiara is reduced to 0 hit points she explodes. Each creature within 60 ft. of her must make a DC 20 dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a succesful save. The explosion leaves behind a phoenix cinder, that weights 5 lbs. and deals 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage to any crteature that touches it. The cinder is immune to all damage, and Kiara is reborn from it in {@dice 1d6} days.

trait.name: Talon of the Phoenix
entries: All of Kiara's weapon attacks are magical, and deal an additional 16 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage on a hit (included in attack).

trait.name: Fiery Wings (1/ day)
entries: As a bonus action, Kiara sprouts a pair of fiery wings. She gains a flying speed of 60 ft. and all creatures within 10 ft. of Kiara at the start of their turn takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage. The wings last for up to an hour. While flying, Kiara is immune to opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/ day)
entries: If Kiara fails a saving throw, she may choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kiara may make three weapon attacks.

action.name: Talon of the Phoenix
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) slashing damage, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it is now on fire. Until it spends an action to extinguish the fire, it will take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of its turn.

action.name: Fiery Wind (3/ day)
entries: Kiara generates a column of strong wind 60 ft. long and 10 ft. wide. All creatures within the column must succeed on a DC 20 strength saving throw or be pushed 15 ft. in the direction of the wind. All creatures in the column take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

bonus.name: Fiery Wings (1/ day)
entries: As a bonus action, Kiara sprouts a pair of fiery wings. She gains a flying speed of 60 ft. and all creatures within 10 ft. of Kiara at the start of their turn takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage. The wings last for up to an hour. While flying, Kiara is immune to opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Shield Bash
entries: When a creature misses Kiara with a melee attack, she may force the creature to make a DC20 strength or dexterity saving throw, being knocked {@condition prone} on a failure.

legendaryHeader: Kiara can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Kiara regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Kiara moves up to her speed.

legendary.name: Sudden Strike
entries: Kiara makes a single Talon of the Phoenix attack.

legendary.name: Burning Claws (Costs 3 actions)
entries: Kiara casts Fireball.

entries.name: Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link @cleanliness_ing|https://x.com/cleanliness_ing/status/1336880594693705729}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

trait.name: Eternal Bard
entries: If Watame is reduce to 0 hit points, instead of falling {@condition unconscious}, she is tranported to the Astral Plane. She will reappear at a random location on the Material Plane 8 seconds later with all hit points regained.

trait.name: Watame Did Nothing Wrong
entries: Watame has advantage on all Charisma and Charisma based skill checks.

trait.name: Asacoco Dance
entries: As a bonus action, Watame expends a use of Bardic Inspiration. A creature of her choice within 60 ft. of her must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) psychic damage and move 10 ft. in a direction of Watame's choice.

trait.name: Gangimari Sheep (1/ day)
entries: As an action, Watame ingests a large dose of Asacoco. For the next hour, Watame automatically succeeds on all Wisdom and Charisma saving throws, and cannot be put to sleep by magical means.

trait.name: Bardic Inspiration (4/ day)
entries: Watame chooses a creature within 60 ft. of her. That creature may add 4 ({@dice 1d8}) to a single ability check, saving throw, or attack roll in the next 10 minutes.

action.name: Gangimari Sheep (1/ day)
entries: As an action, Watame ingests a large dose of Asacoco. For the next hour, Watame automatically succeeds on all Wisdom and Charisma saving throws, and cannot be put to sleep by magical means.

action.name: Horndrill
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If Watame has moved more than 20 ft. in a straight line prior to making the attack, the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Song of Majesty
entries: Watame expends a use of Bardic Inspiration. All creatures of her choice within 60 ft. of her gain 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) temporary hit points until the start of Watame's next turn.

bonus.name: Asacoco Dance
entries: As a bonus action, Watame expends a use of Bardic Inspiration. A creature of her choice within 60 ft. of her must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) psychic damage and move 10 ft. in a direction of Watame's choice.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Watamae is a 6th level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +6 to hit). She has the following spells prepared.

reaction.name: Song of Discord
entries: When a creature within 60ft. of Watame is forced to make a saving throw, she may expend a use of Bardic Inspiration to reduce the saving throw by 2 ({@dice 1d4}).
I'm not at fault here, right? I have nothing to apologise for!

entries.name: Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link 紀尋|https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/83842169}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

trait.name: Trainee Necromancer
entries: Whenever Rushia deals necromantic damage from a spell, she gains hp equal to half the damage done.

trait.name: Fandead
entries: Whenever Rushia casts animate dead she may target an additional corpse or pile of bones, creating an additional zombie or skeleton as appropriate. Undead created by Rushia have an additional 9 hp and a +3 to damage rolls.

trait.name: I'M BOING BOING
entries: Once per day on her turn, if any reference is made to walls, cutting boards, or similarly flat objects, Rushia may enter a rage, giving an ear piercing shout of fury as she does so. Upon entering a rage, all creatures within 30ft of Rushia must make a DC17 Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a succesful one. While raging, Rushia has advantage on all Strength and Constitution skill checks and saving throws. She also gains resistance to non-magical bludgeoning, slashing, and piercing damage, if she does not have it already. She cannot concentrate on any spells for the duration, but gains advantage on any actions or spells targeted at the creature which made the reference that trigggered the rage. At the end of each of her turns while she is raging, Rushia must make a DC25 Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the rage ends, and Rushia is no longer subject to any of these effects. On a failure, the rage continues.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Rushia is an 10th level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Rushia has the following spells available:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger (Thrown)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Smash (Only available during rage)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d12 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. Deals double damage to objects.
I'm boing-boing, nice girl, beautiful girl necromancer, Uruha Rushia!

entries.name: Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link 朱狗|https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79911498}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

monster.name: Usada Pekora, the Princess of Pekoland

trait.name: Bunny Girl
entries: Pekora may take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Yabai, peko!
entries: When Pekora goes below half her hit point total, her TNT cannon immediately recharges.

trait.name: Pekomiko's Great War
entries: Pekora may use Sakura Miko as a nousagi for purpose of Protect your CEO!. As a free action, Pekora may give Miko the {@b Pack Tactics} rule for 24 hours.

action.name: Netherite Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage. The damage done with this sword is considered magical.

action.name: TNT Cannon {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 50/100 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. All creatures within 10ft. of the target take 11 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Konpeko, Konpeko, Konpeko!
entries: A nousagi appears in any available space within 20ft. of Pekora.

action.name: PEKO PEKO PEKO
entries: All nousagi within 30ft. of Pekora may immediately move or take an action.

action.name: Usada Construction
entries: Pekora may designate a rectangular area of ground 5ft by 10ft. This area now counts as either difficult terrain or three-quarters cover, Pekora's choice.

bonus.name: Dash
entries: Pekora may take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action.

bonus.name: Disengagage
entries: Pekora may take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action.

reaction.name: Protect your CEO!
entries: If a nousagi is within 10ft. of Pekora when she is targeted by a weapon attack or spell, she may make the nousagi the target instead of her.

legendaryHeader: Pekora can take 1 legendary action, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. She regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

legendary.name: Welcome to Pekoland!
entries: A {@creature nousagi|HOLOLIVE} appears in any available space within 20ft. of Pekora.

legendary.name: Get 'em peko!
entries: All {@creature nousagi|HOLOLIVE} that can see or hear Pekora immediately move up to their full speed.

legendary.name: AH↓HA↑HA↑.
entries: All {@creature nousagi|HOLOLIVE} that can see or hear Pekora immediately make an attack.

legendary.name: Reload peko!
entries: Pekora's TNT Cannon action recharges.

entries.name: Usada Pekora, the Princess of Pekoland
Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link 猫屋|https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/87285173}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

trait.name: Investamigatorator
entries: Amelia has advantage on any rolls to track a creature and all Investigation or Perception checks

trait.name: Time Traveller
entries: When initiative is rolled, each creature must declare what movement and actions they intend to use on their turn. Amelia may then choose to go at any initiative step.

trait.name: Watson Concoction (3/ day)
entries: As a bonus action, Amelia (or any creature she can touch) may regain 6 ({@dice 1d4 + 4}) hit points, or remove one of the following conditions: Sleep, Blinded, Deafened, Paralyzed, Poisoned.

trait.name: Childhood Stories
entries: Amelia has advantage on all checks to resist poison or being {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Gunslinger
entries: Amelia gains a {@hit 2} to hit against targets within 15 ft. and does not suffer any penalties for making a ranged attack against a creature within 5ft. Amelia scores a critical hit on a roll of 19-20.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Amelia makes two weapon attacks

action.name: Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Pistol (within 15 ft.)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 15 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Trick Shot {@recharge 5}
entries: Amelia uses one of the following trick shot attacks.

action.name: Disarming Shot
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw, or drop any one held object of Amelia's choice that they are carrying and have that object be pushed 10ft. away from her.

action.name: Disarming Shot (within 15 ft.)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 15 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw, or drop any one held object of Amelia's choice that they are carrying and have that object be pushed 10ft. away from her.

action.name: Winging Shot
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Winging Shot (within 15 ft.)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 15 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Dazing Shot
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution save or suffer disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Dazing Shot (within 15 ft.)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 15 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution save or suffer disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of their next turn.

bonus.name: Watson Concoction (3/ day)
entries: As a bonus action, Amelia (or any creature she can touch) may regain 6 ({@dice 1d4 + 4}) hit points, or remove one of the following conditions: Sleep, Blinded, Deafened, Paralyzed, Poisoned.

entries.name: Hololive 5e and Black Powder
entries: All Hololive 5e NPCs have been designed using the optional firearms rules in the Dungeon Master's Guide p. 268. If you do not wish to use gunpowder weapons in your campaign setting, consider reflavoring the profile for a hand crossbow or wandslinger.

entries.name: Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link @Weizen029|https://x.com/i/web/status/1358123923695542275}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The nousagi has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 ft. of it and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the nousagi must make a saving throw that would result in it taking damage, then on a success, the nousagi takes no damage.

action.name: Pound.
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Credits
entries: Art and item designed by {@link 猫屋|https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/87285173}. Please credit if you repost elsewhere.
